Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].name: Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique]
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].flavor: You leap across the field of combat. When you attack, your blade work cuts one enemy deeply and slashes all foes nearby.
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].requirement: You must make this attack using a heavy blade.
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].effect:
You make an Acrobatics check to jump with a +10 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance of the jump isn’t limited by your speed.
Level 21: You make the Acrobatics check with a +20 power bonus.

Storm of Raining Blades.name: Storm of Raining Blades
Storm of Raining Blades.flavor: You are carried aloft by your psionic power, touching down three times to hack through and scatter your foes.
Storm of Raining Blades.requirement: You must make this attack using a heavy blade.
Storm of Raining Blades.effect: You fly 3 squares. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall. You then make a secondary attack that is a melee touch attack.
Storm of Raining Blades.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Storm of Raining Blades.secondaryOnHit: 15 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the tertiary target 2 squares.
Storm of Raining Blades.secondaryeffect: You fly 3 squares. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall. You then make a tertiary attack that is a close burst 1.
Storm of Raining Blades.tertiaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Storm of Raining Blades.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Charge the Clouds.name: Charge the Clouds
Charge the Clouds.flavor: You soar above the fight, avoiding your foes’ attacks as you pass.
Charge the Clouds.effect: You fly your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.
